subs.text:
Hoosier GOP politicians support Trump-style chaos and corruption.

They adore gerrymandering, which is vote theft.

The best are gutless, the worst are corrupt. They don't deserve to be in office.

For the good of our communities, our state and nation, VOTE THEM OUT in November.

subs.text: How a country usually slides into civil war: A group cherishes its power but sees it slipping, organizes and arms, and provokes confrontations that can be used to justify deeper violence. [link]

subs.text: "As Biden’s words made clear, nothing less than democracy itself is on the ballot." [link]
subs.rawText: "As Biden’s words made clear, nothing less than democracy itself is on the ballot." https://t.co/Z5YKD8oFsL

subs.text: "Biden did what he had to do. We have reached a watershed in American politics. The president of the United States has told us directly that our system of government is under attack. What happens next is, in every way, up to us." [link]

subs.text: An unproven, unlikely, or even bogus idea can serve as a “necessary myth” that establishes the reasons for perpetrating injustice. Especially if the idea is repeated loud and long, in Bannon and Breitbart fashion. From @RealRvw over on Insta. [link]
